titleStmt.title: Conceits, clinches, flashes, and whimzies Newly studied, with some collections, but those never published before in this kinde.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Hodgkinsonne for Daniel Frere and are to be sold at the signe of the Bull in little brittain,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through; some pages marked and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bull in little brittain
